resources.string: Yoga Guru
1) The app logo and all the animated yoga poses icons, next, previous and timer icons are Designed by roundicons from www.flaticon.com
2) Beginner, Advance, Intermediate icons and youtube icons are Designed by freepik from www.flaticon.com. Camera icon by is Designed by Prosymbols from www.flaticon.com

3) All the yoga videos are created by HFE (Health and Fitness Education) and the yoga teacher is Karen. Check out their website https://www.hfe.co.uk/yoga to learn more about becoming a qualified yoga teacher with HFE.
2) How Should I Follow The Program?

If you have never done yoga or have taken a long break, then proceed with the Beginner module and continue it for 4 to 5 weeks. Then move onto Intermediate for 5 to 6 weeks posy which start with the Advance Section
3) Should I make changes in my Diet?
Yes, for weight loss and toned body, you should reduce oily food and junk food. For weight gain include protein rich foods in your diet. Please check our Diet Section
1) How Should I Use This App?

Select your goal and level. After that you will get a yoga routine. Tap on the first one pose and watch the complete video of the yoga pose and then start the timer to perform it. Once completed click on the next(Arrow) button
5) No Ads Icon by Those Icons from flat Icon
We recommend you to first consult a doctor in this case and act upon the doctor\'s decision
4) Should I follow the program if I have a medical condition?
5) I am unable to perform a particular yoga pose, What should I do?

Remember if a Yoga pose has two movements(Right and left or Up and Down), then do one movement for half the time on the timer and utilize the remaining time for the other movement. For any other questions please mail us at fitsagefitness@gmail.com
Don\'t let Ads disturb you between your Yoga Routine.
Instead just watch the ads below and make the app Ad Free for the whole day!
Congratulations!! You have an Ad Free app for today

Note : These are general diet plans. If you have any allergies or medical condition such as Diabetes, Blood Pressure, Pregnancy etc we would recommend you to consult a Doctor before following these Plans
